definitions.definition: a combination of qualities, such as shape, color, or form, that pleases the aesthetic senses, especially the sight.
examples: I was struck by her beauty

definitions.definition: a combination of qualities that pleases the intellect or moral sense.
examples: attractiveness, prettiness, good looks, comeliness, allure; Moreloveliness, charm, appeal, eye-appeal, heavenliness; winsomeness, grace, elegance, exquisiteness; splendor, magnificence, grandeur, impressiveness, decorativeness; gorgeousness, glamour; literarybeauteousness, pulchritude "the beauty of the scenery"Moreloveliness, charm, appeal, eye-appeal, heavenliness; winsomeness, grace, elegance, exquisiteness; splendor, magnificence, grandeur, impressiveness, decorativeness; gorgeousness, glamour; beauteousness, pulchritude the beauty of the scenery

definitions.definition: denoting something intended to make a woman more attractive.
a beautiful or pleasing thing or person, in particular.

examples: beautiful woman, belle, vision, Venus, goddess, beauty queen, picture; Moreinformalbabe, hottie, looker, good looker, beaut, siren, doll, arm candy, lovely, stunner, knockout, bombshell, dish, peach, eyeful, fox "she is a beauty"Morebabe, hottie, looker, good looker, beaut, siren, doll, arm candy, lovely, stunner, knockout, bombshell, dish, peach, eyeful, fox she is a beauty

definitions.definition: an excellent specimen or example of something.
examples: the fish was a beauty, around 14 pounds

definitions.definition: the pleasing or attractive features of something.
examples: the beauties of the Pennsylvania mountains

definitions.definition: the best feature or advantage of something.
examples: the beauty of keeping cats is that they don't tie you down
synonyms: selling point "the beauty of this plan"
